My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that im looking for

1

Discuss The Project

I would like to discuss with the customer about the whole project and try to visualize it and talk about the details.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

It would take a short time to build the mock up of the project with the requirements of the user in mind.

3

UI/UX Planning

then into designing the Application using Cutting-Edge technologies and test them to be sure it is what the customer actually needed.

4

Interaction

The deploying the project is not going to be the end of the deal, Constant support and Interaction with the customer is my goal.
